full_summary:
**Tender Announcement - Temporary Help Services in the National Capital Region (NCR)**

**Reference**: cb-6969-83595621
**Amendment**: 2

**Description of Requirement**: The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services. This requirement is open to suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under contract EN578-172870, specifically qualified under Category 5.1 - Computer and Application Support. The DND invites the following SA holders to submit a proposal:
* 9345540 CANADA INC
* Adecco Employment Services Limited
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
* Axons Canada Inc.
* Dare Human Resources Corporation
* Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
* InfoMedia Systems Group, Inc.
* Integra Networks Corporation
* Maverin Inc.
* Nortak Software Ltd.
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* Quarry Consulting Inc.
* TechWind Inc.
* TECSIS Corporation
* TEKSYSTEMS CANADA CORP.

**Security Clearance**: The minimum required security clearance is Reliability.

**Tender Details**
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-13T15:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Trade Agreements**: CPTPP, CFTA
* **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contact Information**
* Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 971-7955

**Documentation**
The tender notice and information package can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6969/s4531589--method-2---rfp/%28english-version.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6969/s4531589--method-2---rfp/%28english-version.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6969/s4531589--method-2---rfp/%28003.pdf](https://can
